name: Isekai Eternal
description:
Borrow the strength of powerful heroes, summoned from other worlds!

Countless champions have been summoned from infinite universes to Nava to battle in the Isekai Wars. It's up to you to lead these all-powerful champions into battle in this realistic, MOBA-style game. Fast-paced gameplay encourages quick decision-making. Your choices can greatly impact how you win!

Challenge what you know about the MOBA genre with a new and unique map and base mechanics!

Capture and control structures in order to unlock the powerful ability to teleport between lanes quickly.
Fight alongside your titan to repel the enemy.
Unique pit shape for boss monsters carrying powerful buffs for your team.

Explore the lore of the world!

Beautiful, engaging lore surrounds our world and its many champions. Discover the backgrounds of each hero before they were summoned to fight in the Isekai Wars! Learn about how the Isekai Wars began.
